page_content: Discusses the cleaning obligation for ships in Zuger waters to prevent the spread of invasive species.
Provides information on how to apply for export certificates for food and consumer goods in the Canton of Zug.
Provides FAQs and terms related to geoinformation, including guides for using ZugMap.ch and other geodata services.
Warns about fraudulent phone calls and emails aimed at stealing banking login information through malware.
Discusses the mandatory reporting of events in the Canton of Zug due to COVID-19 and the measures taken by health authorities.
Provides various forms and guidelines related to consumer protection, including food control and chemical regulations.
Reports on the compliance of the population and businesses in the Canton of Zug with the federal COVID-19 regulations.
Discusses the coordination and tasks of subject groups in schools, including ICT and media education.
Discusses the procedure for the recognition of private schools in the Canton of Zug.
Provides a guide on how to electronically submit tax returns using the eTax.zug software.
Discusses measures to prevent the spread of invasive species in Swiss waters, focusing on aquatic flora and fauna.
Provides interactive maps through ZugMap.ch, including features like printing, measuring, and sketching.
Provides guidelines for creating easement plans using ZugMap.ch, including requirements and accepted formats.
Reports on the smooth start of the Swiss Wrestling and Alpine Festival 2019, detailing the activities and incidents managed by the police, medical services, and fire department.
